item.title: 随着监管机构采取行动，联合信贷银行为竞购 BPM 银行赢得了更多时间
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利市场监管机构将意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购要约叫停了 30 天。【原文：Italy’s market regulator halted UniCredit SpA’s takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA for 30 days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Seven & i 否认拒绝 Couche-Tard 460 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co.反驳了 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.关于该公司拒绝就潜在合并进行有意义谈判的说法，称这家加拿大收购方没有足够重视反垄断问题，也不了解日本的商业运作方式。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. pushed back against Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s assertions that it refused to engage in meaningful talks over a potential merger, saying that the Canadian suitor didn’t take antitrust concerns seriously enough and doesn’t understand how business is conducted in Japan.】

item.title: 莫桑比克马普托港骚乱后吞吐量急剧下降
item.description: 据莫桑比克马普托港运营公司称，在贸易不确定性和社会动荡的影响下，该港今年上半年的货运量急剧下降。【原文：Mozambique’s Maputo port suffered a steep drop in shipments during the first half of the year amid trade uncertainties and social unrest, according to the company that runs its operations.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油出口走高，乌拉尔河流域流量仍在减少
item.description:
波罗的海和黑海主要船级的装运量延续了前一周的飙升势头

。【原文：

Shipments of key Baltic and Black Sea grades gave up previous week’s surge

】

item.title: 匈牙利连续第 10 个月维持关键利率不变以抑制通胀
item.description: 通胀反弹后，匈牙利央行连续第 10 个月维持借贷成本不变。【原文：Hungary’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged as expected for a 10th month after a rebound in inflation.】

item.title: 私募股权投资热潮将中型参与者抛在后面
item.description: 从雷曼兄弟公司的废墟中崛起后，Trilantic Capital Partners 成为私募股权巨大中间市场十多年来成功的典范。【原文：After it emerged from the rubble of Lehman Brothers, Trilantic Capital Partners exemplified the success of private equity’s vast middle market for more than a decade.】

item.title: Blackstone 收购网络运营公司 NetBrain 大部分股份
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正收购 NetBrain Technologies Inc. 的多数股权，再次押注人工智能将改变价值 300 亿美元的网络运营解决方案市场。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is acquiring a majority stake in NetBrain Technologies Inc. in a fresh bet that artificial intelligence will transform the $30 billion network operations solutions market.】

item.title: 伊朗人在与以色列开战前成为间谍软件的目标
item.description: 据最新研究显示，在伊朗与以色列开战前的几个月里，有十多名伊朗人的手机成为间谍软件的目标。【原文：More than a dozen Iranians’ mobile phones were targeted with spyware in the months prior to the country’s war with Israel, according to new research.】

item.title: 贝森特将出席下周在斯德哥尔摩举行的中美会谈
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他将于下周在斯德哥尔摩与中国同行举行第三轮贸易谈判。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he will meet his Chinese counterparts in Stockholm next week for their third round of trade talks.】

item.title: 随着和平协议的临近，特朗普获得了美国在刚果矿区的控制权
item.description:
总统希望获得大量的原材料供应，但各种障碍可能会阻碍发展势头。【原文：

The president wants access to massive supplies of raw materials, but obstacles may check the building momentum.

】

item.title: IBM 软件增长和量子潜力带来新热情
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines Corp.）承诺已久的扭亏为盈已初见成效。【原文：International Business Machines Corp.’s long-promised turnaround has started to bear fruit.】

item.title: 新加坡应用程序引导的汽车共享缓解了飙升的成本
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，贝尼西亚-谭（Benicia Tan）将讨论她的家乡城市独特的昂贵的汽车拥有量，以及人们在应用程序的帮助下开辟的另一条道路。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Benicia Tan addresses her home city’s uniquely expensive car ownership and the alternative paths that people have charted with the help of apps.】

item.title: 对收益率的追逐扭曲了风险最高银行债务中错综复杂的债券数学运算
item.description: 对收益率的不懈追求正在扰乱风险最高的银行债务中错综复杂的债券计算。【原文：A relentless hunt for yield is messing up the intricate bond math in the riskiest type of bank debt.】

item.title: 欧盟官员前往中国和日本 期待喜忧参半的结果
item.description: 欧洲领导人本周将访问日本和中国领导人，预期结果反映出从战争到关税等各种力量正在重新划分全球贸易关系。【原文：European leaders will visit their Japanese and Chinese counterparts this week, and the expected outcomes reflect forces ranging from war to tariffs that are redrawing global trade relationships.】

item.title: 美联储的 "MAGA 货币政策鸡尾酒 "崭露头角
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们要讨论的是美联储政策工具帮助主街与帮助华尔街的论点。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Stripe、SpaceX 投资方 Glade Brook 为新基金融资 5.15 亿美元
item.description: Glade Brook Capital Partners —；一家参股 SpaceX、Perplexity 和其他初创企业的投资公司 —；已从投资者处为其第四期基金募集到 5.15 亿美元。【原文：Glade Brook Capital Partners — an investment firm with stakes in SpaceX, Perplexity and other startups — has raised $515 million from investors for its fourth fund.】

item.title: 雪花、英伟达支持新独角兽 Reka AI，交易金额达 1.1 亿美元
item.description:
雪花公司此前一直在洽谈收购这家成立三年之久的人工智能初创公司。【原文：

Snowflake had previously been in talks to buy the three-year-old AI startup.

】

item.title: 继人工智能竞争对手之后，谷歌寻求与新闻集团进行许可谈判
item.description:
近几个月来，该公司加大了对新闻机构的宣传力度

。【原文：

The company has ramped up its overtures to news organizations in recent months

】

item.title: 佛罗里达州的高速铁路令投资者震惊，违背了其承诺
item.description: 从迈阿密开往奥兰多的 "光明线 "列车被誉为美国铁路旅行未来的另一种愿景，但它却让一些投资者焦虑不安。【原文：The Brightline train running from Miami to Orlando, lauded as an alternative vision for the future of American rail travel, is making some investors anxious.】

item.title: 麻省理工学院的安德鲁-罗（Andrew Lo）认为人工智能五年内就能管理你的资金
item.description: 一年前，安德鲁-罗（Andrew Lo）向 ChatGPT 征求对 Moderna 公司的意见，这是一只在大流行病时期飙升的生物技术股。建议是：卖出。他没有卖。该股暴跌。【原文：A year ago, Andrew Lo asked ChatGPT for its opinion on Moderna Inc., a biotech stock that soared during the pandemic era. The advice: sell. He didn’t. The stock plunged.】

item.title: Alphabet 盈利乐观超越迫在眉睫的反垄断风险
item.description: 在连续数月表现逊于科技同行之后，Alphabet 公司的股价终于出现了生机，因为投资者押注强劲的盈利表现将超过对即将到来的反垄断裁决的担忧。【原文：After months of underperforming their tech peers, Alphabet Inc. shares are finally showing signs of life as investors bet that a strong earnings performance will outweigh concerns about a looming antitrust ruling.】

item.title: Paytm 实现盈利，创始人扭亏为盈
item.description: 随着销售额的增长和成本的下降，Paytm 公布了罕见的利润，这标志着这家金融科技公司在一年多前印度银行监管机构的限制措施对其大部分业务造成损害后正在反弹。【原文：Paytm reported a rare profit as sales grew and costs fell, signaling the fintech firm is bouncing back after the Indian banking regulator’s curbs more than a year ago hurt much of its business.】

item.title: 数十亿美元的天然气财富希望助推莫桑比克债券发行
item.description: 自 4 月份以来，莫桑比克的债券收益率是新兴市场平均收益率的三倍，这主要得益于这个饱受冲突困扰的国家计划重启一个价值数十亿美元的天然气项目。【原文：Mozambique’s bonds have generated three times the average return from emerging markets since April, boosted by the conflict-rattled nation’s plan to revive a multibillion-dollar gas project.】

item.title: 马里法院驳回释放四名巴里克员工的上诉
item.description: 马里一家法院驳回了要求有条件释放自 11 月以来被拘留的四名巴里克矿业公司员工的上诉。【原文：A court in Mali rejected an appeal for the conditional release of four Barrick Mining Corp. employees detained since November.】

item.title: 华尔街准备再次反对美国收紧资本规则
item.description: 华尔街贷款机构及其游说者周二来到美联储首次举行的银行业会议，向新任负责监管的副主席提出了一个广泛的要求：避免更严格的资本要求。【原文：Wall Street lenders and their lobbyists are descending on the Federal Reserve’s first-of-its kind banking conference Tuesday with a broad ask of the new vice chair for supervision: steer clear of stricter capital requirements.】

item.title: 甲骨文将为 OpenAI 数据中心提供 200 万个人工智能芯片
item.description: OpenAI和甲骨文公司宣布将扩大合作，开发4.5千兆瓦的额外美国数据中心容量，进一步推进为人工智能工作负载提供动力的大规模计划。【原文：OpenAI and Oracle Corp. announced they will develop 4.5 gigawatts of additional US data center capacity in an expanded partnership, furthering a massive plan to power artificial intelligence workloads.】

item.title: 印度航空公司寻求约 2 亿美元贷款用于购买飞机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度航空公司正在寻求约 2 亿美元的银行贷款，以便从一家美国飞机租赁公司购买一批波音 777 飞机。【原文：Air India is seeking a bank loan of about $200 million to purchase a fleet of Boeing 777 planes from a US-based aircraft leasing company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法官称 HPE 收购迈克-林奇的 Autonomy 后损失 7.3 亿英镑
item.description: 惠普企业公司收购迈克-林奇的 Autonomy 公司后损失了约 7.3 亿英镑（9.85 亿美元），伦敦法官在这位英国科技大亨游艇在西西里岛海岸风暴中沉没溺水身亡不到一年后作出了这一判决。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. lost around £730 million ($985 million) after it bought Mike Lynch’s firm Autonomy Corp., a London judge ruled less than a year after the British tech tycoon drowned when his yacht sank in a storm off the coast of Sicily.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔将发表讲话，国债承压下滑
item.description: 在美国政府向美联储主席鲍威尔施加越来越大的下台压力之际，投资者关注美联储主席鲍威尔周二晚些时候的讲话，国债有望结束连续四天的涨势。【原文：Treasuries were on course to snap a four-day rally as investors look to a speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell later Tuesday amid mounting pressure on him from the US administration to step down.】

item.title: 六个月过去了，特朗普的大多数交易终于有了回报
item.description:
股票和比特币创下历史新高，大多数债券收益率走低

。【原文：

Stocks and Bitcoin are at records, and most bond yields are lower

】
